name: Sludge Bomb
description: You hurl a mass of sludge that may poison creatures in its blast. Make a ranged attack roll against a target. On a hit, the target takes 2d8 + MOVE poison damage and the area in a 5 foot radius around it is covered in sludge until the beginning of your next turn. Any creature that enters this area for the first time on their turn, or is in that area at the beginning of their turn must make a CON save against your Move DC or become poisoned.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
